testcase.name: Amazon Search for a product Test Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is amazon sign page................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on Home Page...................................................passed When user select search bar and enters procductname.........................passed And user clicks on search Icon..............................................passed Then user is on product page................................................passed Then user select a product..................................................passed And user click on add to cart button........................................passed Then user is on added to cart page..........................................passed When user click on procced to check out button..............................passed Then user is on checkout page...............................................passed
